The HTML Table Caption element (<caption>) specifies the caption (or title) of a table, and if used is always the first child of a <table>.
trans-unit.target: 的HTML表格标题元素（ <caption> ）指定一个表的标题（或标题），并且如果使用的是总是一个的第一个子 <table> 。

trans-unit.source: The HTML Table Caption element (<caption>) specifies the caption (or title) of a table, and if used is always the first child of a <table>. Its styling and physical position relative to the table may be changed using the CSS caption-side and text-align properties.
trans-unit.target: 的HTML表格标题元素（ <caption> ）指定一个表的标题（或标题），并且如果使用的是总是一个的第一个子 <table> 。可以使用CSS caption-side 和 text-align 属性更改其相对于表格的样式和物理位置。

trans-unit.source: The HTML Title element (<title>) defines the document's title that is shown in a browser's title bar or a page's tab.
The HTML Title element (<title>) defines the document's title that is shown in a browser's title bar or a page's tab. It only contains text; tags within the element are ignored.
The HTML Title element (<title>) defines the document's title that is shown in a browser's title bar or a page's tab.
trans-unit.target: 的HTML标题元素（ <title> ）定义了在浏览器中的标题栏或网页的标签中显示的文档的标题。

trans-unit.source: The HTML Title element (<title>) defines the document's title that is shown in a browser's title bar or a page's tab. It only contains text and tags within the element are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 的HTML标题元素（ <title> ）定义了在浏览器中的标题栏或网页的标签中显示的文档的标题。它仅包含文本，元素内的标记将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The HTML Unarticulated Annotation element (<u>) represents a span of inline text which should be rendered in a way that indicates that it has a non-textual annotation.
trans-unit.target: 的HTML未阐明注释元素（ <u> ）表示应该以指示它具有非文本注释的方式来呈现内嵌文本的跨度。

trans-unit.source: The HTML Unarticulated Annotation element (<u>) represents a span of inline text which should be rendered in a way that indicates that it has a non-textual annotation. This is rendered by default as a simple solid underline, but may be altered using CSS.
trans-unit.target: 的HTML未阐明注释元素（ <u> ）表示应该以指示它具有非文本注释的方式来呈现内嵌文本的跨度。默认情况下，它显示为简单的实线下划线，但可以使用CSS进行更改。

trans-unit.source: The HTML Variable element (<var>) represents the name of a variable in a mathematical expression or a programming context.
trans-unit.target: 的HTML变元件（ <var> ）表示数学表达式或可变编程上下文的名称。

trans-unit.source: The HTML Variable element (<var>) represents the name of a variable in a mathematical expression or a programming context. It's typically presented using an italicized version of the current typeface, although that behavior is browser-dependent.
trans-unit.target: 的HTML变元件（ <var> ）表示数学表达式或可变编程上下文的名称。尽管该行为与浏览器有关，但通常使用当前字体的斜体形式显示。

trans-unit.source: The HTML Video element (<video>) embeds a media player which supports video playback into the document.
trans-unit.target: 的HTML视频元素（ <video> ）嵌入其中支持视频播放到文档的媒体播放器。

trans-unit.source: The HTML Video element (<video>) embeds a media player which supports video playback into the document. You can use <video> for audio content as well, but the <audio> element may provide a more appropriate user experience.
trans-unit.target: 的HTML视频元素（ <video> ）嵌入其中支持视频播放到文档的媒体播放器。您也可以将 <video> 用于音频内容，但是 <audio> 元素可能会提供更合适的用户体验。

The HTMLUnarticulated Annotation element (<u>) represents a span of inline text which should be rendered in a way that indicates that it has a non-textual annotation. This is rendered by default as a simple solid underline, but may be altered using CSS.

The accesskeyglobal attribute provides a hint for generating a keyboard shortcut for the current element. The attribute value must consist of a single printable character (which includes accented and other characters that can be generated by the keyboard).
trans-unit.target: 所述ACCESSKEY 全局属性提供一种用于产生键盘快捷键当前元素的提示。该属性值必须包含一个可打印的字符（包括带重音符号和键盘可以生成的其他字符）。

trans-unit.source: The classglobal attribute is a space-separated list of the classes of the element. Classes allows CSS and Javascript to select and access specific elements via the class selectors or functions like the DOM method document.getElementsByClassName.
trans-unit.target: 在类全局属性是元素的类的空格分隔的列表。类允许CSS和Javascript通过类选择器或诸如DOM方法 document.getElementsByClassName 之类的函数来选择和访问特定元素。

trans-unit.source: The data-*global attributes form a class of attributes called custom data attributes, that allow proprietary information to be exchanged between the HTML and its DOM representation by scripts.
trans-unit.target: 该数据- * 全局属性形成一个类的属性称为自定义数据属性，允许之间交换专有信息HTML和DOM的脚本表示。

trans-unit.target: 该ID，类和样式属性具有相同的含义为核心属性在HTML 4规范定义，但只有Netscape和微软定义它们。

trans-unit.source: The idglobal attribute defines a unique identifier (ID) which must be unique in the whole document. Its purpose is to identify the element when linking (using a fragment identifier), scripting, or styling (with CSS).
trans-unit.target: 的ID 全局属性定义一个唯一的标识符（ID），其必须在整个文档中是唯一的。其目的是在链接（使用片段标识符），脚本或样式（使用CSS）时标识元素。

trans-unit.source: The itemtype attribute must have a value that is an unordered set of unique tokens which are case-sensitive, each is a valid and absolute URL, and all defined to use the same vocabulary. The attribute's value must have at least one token.
trans-unit.target: 的项目类型属性必须有一个值是一组无序独特标记，其区分大小写的，各是一个有效的和绝对的URL，并且所有定义为使用相同的词汇。该属性的值必须至少具有一个令牌。

trans-unit.source: The slotglobal attribute assigns a slot in a shadow DOM shadow tree to an element: An element with a slot attribute is assigned to the slot created by the <slot> element whose name attribute's value matches that slot attribute's value.
trans-unit.target: 所述槽全局属性在一个时隙分配影子DOM阴影树到一个元素：与所述的元件 slot 属性分配给由所创建的槽 <slot> 元素，其 name 属性的值匹配该 slot 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The Boolean disabled attribute, when present, makes the element not mutable, focusable, or even submitted with the form. The user can neither edit nor focus on the control, nor its form control descendants. If the disabled attribute is specified on a form control, the element and its form control descendants do not participate in constraint validation. Often browsers grey out such controls and it won't receive any browsing events, like mouse clicks or focus-related ones.

The Boolean readonly attribute, when present, makes the element not mutable, meaning the user can not edit the control. If the readonly attribute is specified on an input element, because the user can not edit the input, the element does not participate in constraint validation.

The Boolean required attribute which, if present, indicates that the user must specify a value for the input before the owning form can be submitted. The required attribute is supported by text, search, url, tel, email, password, date, month, week, time, datetime-local, number, checkbox, radio, file, <input> types along with the <select> and <textarea> form control elements. If present on any of these input types and elements, the :required pseudo class will match. If the attribute is not included, the :optional pseudo class will match.

The Boolean multiple attribute, if set, means the form control accepts one or more values. Valid for the email and file input types and the <select>, the manner by which the user opts for multiple values depends on the form control.

The Boolean multiple attribute, if set, means the user can enter comma separated email addresses in the email widget or can choose more than one file with the file input. See the email and file input type.

The Boolean webkitdirectory attribute, if present, indicates that only directories should be available to be selected by the user in the file picker interface. See HTMLInputElement.webkitdirectory for additional details and examples.
trans-unit.target: 布尔值 webkitdirectory 属性（如果存在）表明用户只能在文件选择器界面中选择目录。有关其他详细信息和示例，请参见 HTMLInputElement.webkitdirectory 。

trans-unit.source: The Boolean attribute incremental is a WebKit and Blink extension (so supported by Safari, Opera, Chrome, etc.) which, if present, tells the user agent to process the input as a live search. As the user edits the value of the field, the user agent sends search events to the HTMLInputElement object representing the search box. This allows your code to update the search results in real time as the user edits the search.
trans-unit.target: 布尔属性 incremental 是WebKit和Blink扩展（因此受Safari，Opera，Chrome等支持），如果存在，它会告诉用户代理将输入作为实时搜索进行处理。当用户编辑字段的值时，用户代理会将 search 事件发送到表示搜索框的 HTMLInputElement 对象。这使您的代码可以在用户编辑搜索时实时更新搜索结果。

trans-unit.source: The CORS request is sent with any credentials included (that is, cookies, X.509 certificates, and the Authorization request header). If the server does not opt into sharing credentials with the origin site (by sending back the Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true response header), then the browser marks the image as tainted and restricts access to its image data.

trans-unit.source: The DOCTYPE shown in the example, <!DOCTYPE html>, is the simplest possible, and the one recommended by HTML5. Earlier versions of the HTML standard recommended other variants, but all existing browsers today will use full standards mode for this DOCTYPE, even the dated Internet Explorer 6. There are no valid reasons to use a more complicated DOCTYPE. If you do use another DOCTYPE, you may risk choosing one which triggers almost standards mode or quirks mode.
trans-unit.target: 示例中显示的DOCTYPE <!DOCTYPE html> 是最简单的，也是HTML5推荐的。HTML标准的早期版本推荐了其他变体，但是今天所有现有的浏览器都将为此DOCTYPE使用完全标准的模式，即使是过时的Internet Explorer 6也没有充分的理由使用更复杂的DOCTYPE。如果您确实使用另一种DOCTYPE，则可能会冒险选择一个会触发几乎标准模式或怪异模式的DOCTYPE。

trans-unit.source: The Google Chrome UI for auto-complete request varies, depending on whether autocomplete is set to off on <input> elements as well as their form. Specifically, when a form has autocomplete set to off and its <input> element's autocomplete attribute is not set, then if the user asks for autofill suggestions for the <input> element, Chrome might display a message saying 'autocomplete has been disabled for this form.' On the other hand, if both the form and the input element have autocomplete set to off, the browser will not display that message. For this reason, you should set autocomplete to off for each <input> that has custom auto-completion.
trans-unit.target: 谷歌浏览器UI用于自动完成请求不同而不同，这取决于是否 autocomplete 被设置为 off 上 <input> 元件以及它们的形式。具体来说，当表单的 autocomplete 设置为 off 并且未设置其 <input> 元素的 autocomplete 属性时，则如果用户要求为 <input> 元素提供自动填充建议，Chrome可能会显示一条消息，指出“为此已禁用自动完成功能形成。'另一方面，如果将表单和输入元素的 autocomplete 设置为 off ，则浏览器将不会显示该消息。因此，您应该设置 autocomplete 对于具有自定义自动完成功能的每个 <input> ，自动完成功能都将 off 。

trans-unit.source: The HTML <input type="datetime"> was a control for entering a date and time (hour, minute, second, and fraction of a second) as well as a timezone. This feature has been removed from WHATWG HTML, and is no longer supported in browsers.
trans-unit.target: HTML <input type="datetime"> 是用于输入日期和时间（小时，分钟，秒和秒的一部分）以及时区的控件。此功能已从WHATWG HTML中删除，并且不再受浏览器支持。

trans-unit.source: The HTML <keygen> element exists to facilitate generation of key material, and submission of the public key as part of an HTML form. This mechanism is designed for use with Web-based certificate management systems. It is expected that the <keygen> element will be used in an HTML form along with other information needed to construct a certificate request, and that the result of the process will be a signed certificate.
trans-unit.target: HTML <keygen> 元素的存在是为了促进密钥材料的生成以及将公共密钥作为HTML表单的一部分提交。该机制旨在与基于Web的证书管理系统一起使用。预计 <keygen> 元素将以HTML形式与构造证书请求所需的其他信息一起使用，并且该过程的结果将是签名证书。

trans-unit.source: The HTML <marquee> element is used to insert a scrolling area of text. You can control what happens when the text reaches the edges of its content area using its attributes.
trans-unit.target: HTML <marquee> 元素用于插入文本的滚动区域。您可以使用文本的属性控制文本到达其内容区域的边缘时发生的情况。

trans-unit.source: The HTML <time> represents a specific period in time.

The HTML <time> represents a specific period in time. It may include the datetime attribute to translate dates into machine-readable format, allowing for better search engine results or custom features such as reminders.

The HTML <tr> element specifies that the markup contained inside the <tr> block comprises one row of a table, inside which the <th> and <td> elements create header and data cells, respectively, within the row. Each cell is placed into its own column; the user agent follows specific rules to determine how the cells in each row are placed into columns with those coming from other rows.
trans-unit.target: HTML <tr> 元素指定 <tr> 块中包含的标记包括表的一行，在其中表的 <th> 和 <td> 元素分别在该行中创建标题和数据单元格。每个单元格都放置在自己的列中；所述用户代理将按照特定的规则，以确定如何在每行中的单元被置于列与那些从其它行的到来。

trans-unit.source: The HTML autocomplete attribute is available on <input> elements that take a text or numeric value as input, <textarea> elements, <select> elements, and <form> elements. autocomplete lets web developers specify what if any permission the user agent has to provide automated assistance in filling out form field values, as well as guidance to the browser as to the type of information expected in the field.

The HTML autocomplete attribute is available on several kinds of <input> elements—those that take a text or numeric value as input. autocomplete lets web developers specify what if any permission the user agent has to provide automated assistance in filling out form field values, as well as guidance to the browser as to the type of information expected in the field.
trans-unit.target: HTML autocomplete 属性在几种 <input> 元素上可用-那些以文本或数字值作为输入的元素。 autocomplete ，Web开发人员可以指定用户代理在填写表单字段值时是否必须提供自动协助（如果有任何权限）以及向浏览器提供有关该字段中预期信息类型的指导。

trans-unit.source: The HTML Bidirectional Isolate element (<bdi>) tells the browser's bidirectional algorithm to treat the text it contains in isolation from its surrounding text.
trans-unit.target: HTML 双向隔离元素（ <bdi> ）告诉浏览器的双向算法将其包含的文本与周围的文本隔离。

trans-unit.source: The HTML Bidirectional Isolate element (<bdi>) tells the browser's bidirectional algorithm to treat the text it contains in isolation from its surrounding text. It's particularly useful when a website dynamically inserts some text and doesn't know the directionality of the text being inserted.
trans-unit.target: HTML 双向隔离元素（ <bdi> ）告诉浏览器的双向算法将其包含的文本与周围的文本隔离。当网站动态插入一些文本并且不知道所插入文本的方向性时，此功能特别有用。

trans-unit.source: The HTML Strong Importance Element (<strong> indicates that its contents have strong importance, seriousness, or urgency. Browsers typically render the contents in bold type.
trans-unit.target: HTML 强重要性元素（ <strong> 表示其内容具有重要意义，重要性或紧迫性。浏览器通常以粗体显示内容。

trans-unit.source: The HTML Strong Importance Element (<strong>) indicates that its contents have strong importance, seriousness, or urgency. Browsers typically render the contents in bold type.
The HTML Subscript element (<sub>) specifies inline text which should be displayed as subscript for solely typographical reasons.

The HTML Subscript element (<sub>) specifies inline text which should be displayed as subscript for solely typographical reasons. Subscripts are typically rendered with a lowered baseline using smaller text.
The HTML Variable element (<var>) represents the name of a variable in a mathematical expression or a programming context.

The HTML Variable element (<var>) represents the name of a variable in a mathematical expression or a programming context. It's typically presented using an italicized version of the current typeface, although that behavior is browser-dependent.
The HTML Acronym Element (<acronym>) allows authors to clearly indicate a sequence of characters that compose an acronym or abbreviation for a word.

The HTML Acronym Element (<acronym>) allows authors to clearly indicate a sequence of characters that compose an acronym or abbreviation for a word. This element has been removed in HTML5. Use <abbr> element.
trans-unit.target: HTML首字母缩略词元素（ <acronym> ）允许作者清楚地指示构成单词首字母缩写词或缩写词的一系列字符。此元素已在HTML5中删除。使用 <abbr> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTML Acronym Element (<acronym>) allows authors to clearly indicate a sequence of characters that compose an acronym or abbreviation for a word. This element has been removed in HTML5. Use <abbr> element.

trans-unit.source: The HTML specification defines the following set of standard metadata names:

The HTML specification doesn't define where the baseline of a <textarea> is, so different browsers set it to different positions. For Gecko, the <textarea> baseline is set on the baseline of the first line of the textarea's first line, on another browser it may be set on the bottom of the <textarea> box. Don't use vertical-align: baseline on it; the behavior is unpredictable.
trans-unit.target: HTML规范没有定义 <textarea> 的基线在哪里，因此不同的浏览器将其设置在不同的位置。对于Gecko， <textarea> 基线设置在textarea第一行第一行的基线上，在另一个浏览器上，它可以设置在 <textarea> 框的底部。不要在其上使用 vertical-align : baseline ；行为是无法预测的。

trans-unit.source: The HTML specification doesn't define where the baseline of a <textarea> is, so different browsers set it to different positions. For Gecko, the <textarea> baseline is set on the baseline of the first line of the textarea, on another browser it may be set on the bottom of the <textarea> box. Don't use vertical-align: baseline on it; the behavior is unpredictable.

The HTML specification gives browsers some flexibility on how to present the range control. Nowhere is this flexibility more apparent than in the area of hash marks and, to a lesser degree, labels. The specification describes how to add custom points to the range control using the list attribute and a <datalist> element, but does not have any requirements or even recommendations for standardized hash or tick marks along the length of the control.
trans-unit.target: HTML规范使浏览器在如何显示范围控件方面具有一定的灵活性。在散列标记和较小程度上的标签方面，这种灵活性最明显。该规范描述了如何使用 list 属性和 <datalist> 元素将自定义点添加到范围控件，但是对控件长度上的标准化哈希或刻度线没有任何要求甚至建议。

trans-unit.source: The HTML specification recommends that browsers automatically switch to drawing range controls vertically if the specified width is less than the height. Unfortunately, no major browsers currently support vertical range controls directly. You can, however, create a vertical range control by drawing a horizontal range control on its side. The easiest way is to use CSS: by applying a transform to rotate the element, you can make it vertical. Let's take a look.
trans-unit.target: HTML规范建议，如果指定的宽度小于高度，浏览器会自动垂直切换到绘图范围控件。不幸的是，当前没有主流浏览器直接支持垂直范围控件。但是，您可以通过在侧面绘制水平范围控件来创建垂直范围控件。最简单的方法是使用CSS：通过应用 transform 旋转元素，可以使其垂直。让我们来看看。

trans-unit.source: The IDL attribute is also known as a JavaScript property. These are the attributes you can read or set using JavaScript properties like element.foo. The IDL attribute is always going to use (but might transform) the underlying content attribute to return a value when you get it and is going to save something in the content attribute when you set it. In other words, the IDL attributes, in essence, reflect the content attributes.
trans-unit.target: IDL属性也称为JavaScript属性。这些是您可以使用JavaScript属性（例如 element.foo )读取或设置的属性。IDL属性将始终使用（但可能会转换）基础内容属性以在获取值时返回值，并在设置属性时将其保存在内容属性中。换句话说，IDL属性实质上反映了内容属性。

trans-unit.source: The MP3 audio format (.mp3, audio/mpeg; distinct from the above MP3 audio in an MP4 container case) is supported in <audio> by Firefox/Firefox for Android/Firefox OS when the operating system provides an MP3 decoder, and by Internet Explorer, Chrome and Safari.
trans-unit.target: 当操作系统提供MP3解码器时，适用于Android / Firefox OS的Firefox / Firefox 在 <audio> 中支持MP3音频格式（.mp3， audio/mpeg ；与上述MP4音频盒中的MP3音频不同）。 Internet Explorer，Chrome和Safari。

trans-unit.source: The MP4 container format with the H.264 video codec and the AAC audio codec is natively supported by desktop/mobile Internet Explorer, Safari and Chrome, but Chromium and Opera do not support the format. IE and Chrome also support the MP3 audio codec in the MP4 container, but Safari does not. Firefox/Firefox for Android/Firefox OS supports the format in some cases, but only when a third-party decoder is available, and the device hardware can handle the profile used to encode the MP4.
trans-unit.target: 桌面/移动互联网浏览器、Safari和Chrome浏览器原生支持带有H.264视频编解码器和AAC音频编解码器的MP4容器格式,但Chromium和Opera不支持该格式。IE和Chrome也支持MP4容器中的MP3音频编解码器,但Safari不支持。Firefox/Firefox for Android/Firefox OS在某些情况下支持该格式,但只有当第三方解码器可用时,并且设备硬件可以处理用于编码MP4的配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The MPEG media formats are covered by patents, which are not freely licensed. Some of the necessary licenses can be bought from MPEG LA. Since H.264 is currently not a royalty free format, it is unfit for the open web platform, according to Mozilla [1, 2], Google [1, 2] and Opera. However, since royalty free formats are not supported by Internet Explorer and Safari, Mozilla has decided to support the format anyway, and Google never fulfilled their promise to remove support for it in Chrome.
trans-unit.target: MPEG媒体格式受专利保护，没有免​​费许可。可以从MPEG LA购买某些必要的许可证。由于H.264是目前不是一个免版税的格式，它是不适合开放的网络平台，据Mozilla [ 1，2 ]，谷歌[ 1，2 ]和Opera。但是，由于Internet Explorer和Safari不支持免版税格式，因此Mozilla决定仍然支持该格式，并且Google从未兑现其在Chrome中取消对此格式的支持的承诺。

The WebM format, specifically the VP8 video codec, had been accused of patent infringment by a group of companies answering a call by the MPEG LA for the formation of a patent pool, but MPEG LA has agreed to license those patents to Google under a "perpetual, transferable, royalty free license". This means, effectively, that all known patents on the WebM format are licensed to everyone for free.
trans-unit.target: WebM格式，特别是VP8视频编解码器，已被一群公司指控MPEG LA要求建立专利池的呼叫而侵犯了专利，但是MPEG LA已同意根据“ 永久，可转让，免版税的许可证”。实际上，这意味着WebM格式的所有已知专利均免费授予所有人。

trans-unit.source: The above example shows usage of the <img> element:

The above example shows very simple usage of the <img> element. The src attribute is required, and contains the path to the image you want to embed. The alt attribute contains a textual description of the image, which isn't mandatory but is incredibly useful for accessibility — screenreaders read this description out to their users so they know what the image shows, and it is also displayed on the page if the image can't be loaded for some reason.
trans-unit.target: 上面的示例显示了 <img> 元素的非常简单的用法。在 src 属性是必需的，并且包含路径到要嵌入图像。该 alt 属性包含图像，这不是强制性的，但令人难以置信的是有用的辅助功能的文字说明-让他们知道什么样的图像显示屏幕阅读器阅读本描述出他们的用户，它也显示，如果图像在页面上由于某种原因而无法加载。

trans-unit.source: The adjustments to the algorithm (taking a leap year when the year can be divided by 400, and skipping leap years when the year is divisible by 100) help to bring the average even closer to the correct number of days (365.2425 days). Scientists occasionally add leap seconds to the calendar (seriously) to handle the remaining three ten-thousandths of a day and to compensate for the gradual, naturally occurring slowing of Earth's rotation.

The advantage to averaging colors can be that often what looks like a solid color is actually a surprisingly varied number of related colors all used in concert, blending to create a desired effect. Picking just one of these pixels can result in getting a color that on its own looks very out of place.

trans-unit.source: The best way to deal with dates in forms in a cross-browser way (until all of the major browsers have supported them for a while) is to get the user to enter the month and year in separate controls (<select> elements being popular; see below for an implementation), or use JavaScript libraries such as the jQuery date picker plugin.
trans-unit.target: 跨浏览器处理表单中日期的最佳方法（直到所有主要浏览器都支持它们一段时间了）是使用户在单独的控件中输入月份和年份（ <select> 元素很受欢迎） ；请参见下面的实现），或使用JavaScript库（例如jQuery日期选择器插件）。

trans-unit.source: The best way to deal with dates in forms in a cross-browser way at the moment is to get the user to enter the day, month, and year in separate controls (<select> elements being popular; see below for an implementation), or to use a JavaScript library such as jQuery date picker.
trans-unit.target: 目前，以跨浏览器方式处理表单中日期的最佳方法是让用户在单独的控件中输入日期，月份和年份（ <select> 元素很流行；有关实现，请参见下文），或使用JavaScript库（例如jQuery日期选择器）。

trans-unit.source: The best way to deal with dates in forms in a cross-browser way at the moment is to get the user to enter the day, month, year, and time in separate controls (<select> elements being popular — see below for an implementation), or use JavaScript libraries such as jQuery date picker, and the jQuery timepicker plugin.
trans-unit.target: 目前，以跨浏览器方式处理表单中日期的最佳方法是让用户在单独的控件中输入日期，月份，年份和时间（ <select> 元素很受欢迎，请参见下面的实现），或使用JavaScript库（例如jQuery日期选择器和jQuery timepicker插件）。

trans-unit.source: The best way to deal with times in forms in a cross-browser way, for the time being, is to get the user to enter the hours and minutes (and seconds if required) in separate controls (<select> elements are popular; see below for an example), or use JavaScript libraries such as the jQuery timepicker plugin.
trans-unit.target: 目前，以跨浏览器方式处理表单中时间的最佳方法是让用户在单独的控件中输入小时和分钟（如果需要，还可以输入秒）（ <select> 元素很流行；请参见下方的示例），或使用JavaScript库（例如jQuery timepicker插件）。

trans-unit.source: The best way to deal with week/years in forms in a cross-browser way at the moment is to get the user to enter the week number and year in separate controls (<select> elements being popular; see below for an example), or use JavaScript libraries such as jQuery date picker.
trans-unit.target: 目前，以跨浏览器方式处理周/年的最佳方法是让用户在单独的控件中输入周数和年（ <select> 元素很流行；请参见下面的示例），或使用JavaScript库（例如jQuery日期选择器）。

The browser will use this information in tandem with the user's browser or device settings to determine what colors to use for everything from background and foregrounds to form controls and scrollbars. The primary use for <meta name="color-scheme"> is to indicate compatibility with—and order of preference for—light and dark color modes.
The cache manifest file
trans-unit.target: 缓存清单文件

trans-unit.source: The cache manifest file is a simple text file that lists the resources the browser should cache for offline access. Resources are identified by URI. Entries listed in the cache manifest must have the same scheme, host, and port as the manifest.
trans-unit.target: 缓存清单文件是一个简单的文本文件,它列出了浏览器应缓存的资源,以便离线访问。资源由URI标识。缓存清单中列出的条目必须具有与清单相同的方案、主机和端口。

trans-unit.source: The cache manifest section listed above ensures that requests to load resources contained in the http://www.example.com/api/ subtree always go to the network without attempting to access the cache.
trans-unit.target: 上面列出的缓存清单部分可确保加载 http://www.example.com/api/ 子树中包含的资源的请求始终进入网络，而不会尝试访问缓存。

trans-unit.source: The content attribute is the attribute as you set it from the content (the HTML code) and you can set it or get it via element.setAttribute() or element.getAttribute(). The content attribute is always a string even when the expected value should be an integer. For example, to set an <input> element's maxlength to 42 using the content attribute, you have to call setAttribute("maxlength", "42") on that element.
trans-unit.target: content属性是您从内容（HTML代码）中设置的属性，您可以通过 element.setAttribute() 或 element.getAttribute() 进行设置或获取。即使期望值应该是整数，content属性也始终是字符串。例如，要使用content属性将 <input> 元素的最大 maxlength 为42，必须在该元素上调用 setAttribute("maxlength", "42") 。

The content of the page that the embedded context is to contain. This attribute is expected to generally be used together with the sandbox attribute. If a browser supports the srcdoc attribute, it will override the content specified in the src attribute (if present). If a browser does not support the srcdoc attribute, it will show the file specified in the src attribute instead (if present). Note that if the content of the attribute contains a script tag then a closing script tag is required for the script to run, even if nothing else comes after the script.
trans-unit.target: 嵌入式上下文要包含的页面内容。该属性通常应与 sandbox 属性一起使用。如果浏览器支持 srcdoc 属性，它将覆盖 src 属性中指定的内容（如果存在）。如果浏览器不不支持 srcdoc 属性，它会显示在指定的文件 src 属性，而不是（如果存在的话）。请注意，如果属性的内容包含脚本标记，那么即使脚本后面没有其他内容，运行脚本也需要关闭脚本标记。

trans-unit.source: The contents of a page title can have significant implications for search engine optimization (SEO). In general, a longer, descriptive title performs better than short or generic titles. The content of the title is one of the components used by search engine algorithms to decide the order in which to list pages in search results. Also, the title is the initial "hook" by which you grab the attention of readers glancing at the search results page.

The control is intended to simply represent a local date and time, not necessarily the user's local date and time. In other words, an implementation should allow any valid combination of year, month, day, hour, and minute - even if such a combination is invalid in the user's local time zone (such as times within a daylight saving time spring-forward transition gap). Some mobile browsers (particularly on iOS) do not currently implement this correctly.

trans-unit.source: The custom validFileType() function takes a File object as a parameter, then uses Array.prototype.includes() to check if any value in the fileTypes matches the file's type property. If a match is found, the function returns true. If no match is found, it returns false.

trans-unit.source: The distinction of block-level vs. inline elements was used in HTML specifications up to 4.01. In HTML5, this binary distinction is replaced with a more complex set of content categories. While the "inline" category roughly corresponds to the category of phrasing content, the "block-level" category doesn't directly correspond to any HTML5 content category, but "block-level" and "inline" elements combined together correspond to the flow content in HTML5. There are also additional categories, e.g. interactive content.
trans-unit.target: 直到4.01的HTML规范都使用了块级元素与内联元素的区别。在HTML5中，这种二进制区别被一组更复杂的内容类别所取代。尽管“内联”类别大致对应于措辞内容的类别，但“块级”类别并不直接对应于任何HTML5内容类别，但是组合在一起的“块级”和“内联”元素对应于流程 HTML5中的内容。还有其他类别，例如交互式内容。

trans-unit.source: The distinction of block-level vs. inline elements was used in HTML specifications up to 4.01. In HTML5, this binary distinction is replaced with a more complex set of content categories. While the "inline" category roughly corresponds to the category of phrasing content, the "block-level" category doesn't directly correspond to any HTML5 content category, but "block-level" and "inline" elements combined together correspond to the flow content in HTML5. There are also additional categories, e.g. interactive content.

trans-unit.source: The form element that the <textarea> element is associated with (its "form owner"). The value of the attribute must be the id of a form element in the same document. This attribute enables you to place <textarea> elements anywhere within a document, not just as descendants of form elements.

trans-unit.source: The form element that the button is associated with (its form owner). The value of the attribute must be the id attribute of a <form> element in the same document. If this attribute is not specified, the <button> element will be associated to an ancestor <form> element, if one exists. This attribute enables you to associate <button> elements to <form> elements anywhere within a document, not just as descendants of <form> elements.
trans-unit.target: 与按钮关联的表单元素（其表单所有者）。该属性的值必须是同一文档中 <form> 元素的id属性。如果未指定此属性，则 <button> 元素将与祖先 <form> 元素（如果存在）关联。此属性使您可以将 <button> 元素与文档中任何位置的 <form> 元素相关联，而不仅仅是 <form> 元素的后代。

trans-unit.source: The form element that this element is associated with (its form owner). The value of the attribute must be an id of a <form> element in the same document. trans-unit.source: The format for lines of data varies from section to section. In the explicit (CACHE:) section, each line is a valid URI or IRI reference to a resource to cache (no wildcard characters are allowed in this sections). Whitespace is allowed before and after the URI or IRI on each line. In the Fallback section each line is a valid URI or IRI reference to a resource, followed by a fallback resource that is to be served up when a connection with the server cannot be made. In the network section, each line is a valid URI or IRI reference to a resource to fetch from the network (or the wildcard character * can be used in this section).
trans-unit.target: 数据行的格式因节而异。在显式（ CACHE: )节中，每一行都是对要缓存的资源的有效URI或IRI引用（此节中不允许使用通配符）。每行的URI或IRI前后都允许有空格。在“回退”部分中，每一行都是对资源的有效URI或IRI引用，后跟一个回退资源，当无法与服务器建立连接时，将回退该资源。在网络部分中，每一行都是对要从网络中获取的资源的有效URI或IRI引用（或在该部分中可以使用通配符 * ）。

The idea here is that during step 2, the ID of the record being updated is kept in a hidden input. When the form is submitted in step 3, the ID is automatically sent back to the server with the record content. The ID lets the site's server-side component know exactly which record needs to be updated with the submitted data.
trans-unit.target: 这里的想法是,在步骤2中,被更新记录的ID被保存在一个隐藏的输入中。当第3步提交表单时,ID会和记录内容一起自动发回服务器。这个ID可以让网站的服务器端组件知道到底是哪条记录需要用提交的数据进行更新。

trans-unit.source: The image URL. Mandatory for the <img> element. On browsers supporting srcset, src is treated like a candidate image with a pixel density descriptor 1x, unless an image with this pixel density descriptor is already defined in srcset, or unless srcset contains w descriptors.

The image URL. This attribute is mandatory for the <img> element. On browsers supporting srcset, src is treated like a candidate image with a pixel density descriptor 1x unless an image with this pixel density descriptor is already defined in srcset, or unless srcset contains 'w' descriptors.
trans-unit.target: 图片网址。此属性对于 <img> 元素是必需的。在支持 srcset 的浏览器上，除非已在 srcset, 定义了具有此像素密度描述符的图像，或者除非 srcset 包含' w '描述符，否则将 src 视为像素密度描述符为 1x 的候选图像。

trans-unit.source: The most common use for the icon value is the favicon:

The most important rule: never use color as the only way to know something. If, for example, you indicate success or failure of an operation by changing the color of a shape from white to green for success and red for failure, users with red-green color-blindness won't be able to use your site properly. Instead, perhaps use both text and color together, so that everyone can understand what's happening.
trans-unit.target: 最重要的规则是:永远不要把颜色作为了解某件事的唯一途径。例如,如果你通过改变形状的颜色来表示操作的成功或失败,从白色到绿色表示成功,红色表示失败,那么有红绿色盲症的用户将无法正常使用你的网站。相反,也许可以同时使用文字和颜色,这样大家就能明白发生了什么。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete <acronym> element, whose responsibilities were folded into <abbr>
trans-unit.target: <acronym> 元素已过时，其职责被折叠为 <abbr>

trans-unit.source: The obsolete <element> was part of the Web Components specification; it was intended to be used to define new custom DOM elements.
trans-unit.target: 过时的 <element> 是Web Components规范的一部分；它旨在用于定义新的自定义DOM元素。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete <element> was part of the Web Components specification; it was intended to be used to define new custom DOM elements. It was removed in favor of a JavaScript-driven approach for creating new custom elements.

The obsolete <element> was part of the Web Components specification; it was intended to be used to define new custom DOM elements. It was removed in favor of a JavaScript-driven approach for creating new custom elements; however, that technology is not mature and no browers fully implement it.
trans-unit.target: 过时的 <element> 是Web Components规范的一部分；它旨在用于定义新的自定义DOM元素。删除它是为了使用JavaScript驱动的方法来创建新的自定义元素。但是，该技术还不成熟，没有任何浏览器可以完全实施。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete <image> is an obsolete remnant of an ancient version of HTML lost in the mists of time; use the standard <img> element instead.
trans-unit.target: 过时的 <image> 是在时间的迷雾中丢失的旧版HTML的过时残余；请使用标准的 <img> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete <image> is an obsolete remnant of an ancient version of HTML lost in the mists of time; use the standard <img> element instead. Seriously, the specification even literally uses the words "Don't ask" when describing this element.
trans-unit.target: 过时的 <image> 是在时间的迷雾中丢失的旧版HTML的过时残余；请使用标准的 <img> 元素。认真地说，规范在描述此元素时甚至在字面上使用了“不要问”一词。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Applet Element (<applet>) embeds a Java applet into the document; this element has been deprecated in favor of <object>.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Applet元素（ <applet> ）将Java applet嵌入文档中。不推荐使用此元素，而推荐使用 <object> 。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Applet Element (<applet>) embeds a Java applet into the document; this element has been deprecated in favor of <object>.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Applet元素（ <applet> ）将Java applet嵌入文档中。不推荐使用此元素，而推荐使用 <object> 。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Base Font element (<basefont>) sets a default font face, size, and color for the other elements which are descended from its parent element.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Base Font元素（ <basefont> ）为从其父元素派生的其他元素设置默认字体，大小和颜色。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Base Font element (<basefont>) sets a default font face, size, and color for the other elements which are descended from its parent element. With this set, the font's size can then be varied relative to the base size using the <font> element.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Base Font元素（ <basefont> ）为从其父元素派生的其他元素设置默认字体，大小和颜色。通过此设置，然后可以使用 <font> 元素相对于基本大小来更改字体大小。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Big Element (<big>) renders the enclosed text at a font size one level larger than the surrounding text (medium becomes large, for example).
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Big Element（ <big> ）以比周围文本 large 一级的字体大小（例如， medium 变大）呈现了封闭的文本。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Big Element (<big>) renders the enclosed text at a font size one level larger than the surrounding text (medium becomes large, for example). The size is capped at the browser's maximum permitted font size.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Big Element（ <big> ）以比周围文本 large 一级的字体大小（例如， medium 变大）呈现了封闭的文本。大小上限为浏览器允许的最大字体大小。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Center Element (<center>) is a block-level element that displays its block-level or inline contents centered horizontally within its containing element. The container is usually, but isn't required to be, <body>.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Center元素（ <center> ）是一个块级元素，它在其包含元素内水平居中显示其块级或内联内容。容器通常是但不是必需的 <body> 。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Center Element (<center>) is a block-level element that displays its block-level or inline contents centered horizontally within its containing element.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Center元素（ <center> ）是一个块级元素，它在其包含元素内水平居中显示其块级或内联内容。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Directory element (<dir>) is used as a container for a directory of files and/or folders, potentially with styles and icons applied by the user agent.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Directory元素（ <dir> ）用作文件和/或文件夹目录的容器，可能带有用户代理应用的样式和图标。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Directory element (<dir>) is used as a container for a directory of files and/or folders, potentially with styles and icons applied by the user agent. Do not use this obsolete element; instead, you should use the <ul> element for lists, including lists of files.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Directory元素（ <dir> ）用作文件和/或文件夹目录的容器，可能带有用户代理应用的样式和图标。请勿使用此过时的元素。相反，您应该对列表使用 <ul> 元素，包括文件列表。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Teletype Text element (<tt>) creates inline text which is presented using the user agent's default monospace font face.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Teletype Text元素（ <tt> ）创建内联文本，该文本使用用户代理的默认等宽字体显示。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Teletype Text element (<tt>) creates inline text which is presented using the user agent's default monospace font face. This element was created for the purpose of rendering text as it would be displayed on a fixed-width display such as a teletype, text-only screen, or line printer.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Teletype Text元素（ <tt> ）创建内联文本，该文本使用用户代理的默认等宽字体显示。创建此元素是为了呈现文本，因为它将显示在固定宽度的显示器上，例如电传打字机，纯文本屏幕或行式打印机。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML No Frames or frame fallback element, <noframes>, provides content to be presented in browsers that don't support (or have disabled support for) the <frame> element.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML No Frames或框架回退元素 <noframes> 提供了要在不支持 <frame> 元素（或已禁用）的浏览器中显示的内容。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML No Frames or frame fallback element, <noframes>, provides content to be presented in browsers that don't support (or have disabled support for) the <frame> element. Although most commonly-used browsers support frames, there are exceptions, including certain special-use browsers including some mobile browsers, as well as text-mode browsers.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML No Frames或框架回退元素 <noframes> 提供了要在不支持 <frame> 元素（或已禁用）的浏览器中显示的内容。尽管大多数常用的浏览器都支持框架，但也有例外，包括某些特殊用途的浏览器（包括某些移动浏览器）和文本模式浏览器。

trans-unit.source: The only way to modify dynamically the value of the readonly attribute is through a script.
The operation to activate the accesskey depends on browser and its platform.
trans-unit.target: 激活accesskey的操作取决于浏览器及其平台。

trans-unit.source: The organization with which the contact is associated. This includes the following subproperties:
trans-unit.target: 与该联系人有联系的组织。这包括以下子属性:

trans-unit.source: The other elements containing metadata: <base>, <head>, <link>, <style>,<title>.
trans-unit.target: 包含元数据的其他元素： <base> ， <head> ， <link> ， <style> ， <title> 。

trans-unit.source: The other part of the code that may be of interest is the feature detection code — to detect whether the browser supports <input type="date">, we create a new <input> element, set its type to date, then immediately check what its type is set to — non-supporting browsers will return text, because the date type falls back to type text. If <input type="date"> is not supported, we hide the native picker and show the fallback picker UI (<select>) instead.
trans-unit.target: 代码的另一部分可能是功能检测代码—要检测浏览器是否支持 <input type="date"> ，我们将创建一个新的 <input> 元素，并将其 type 设置为 date ，然后立即检查它的类型设置为什么-不支持的浏览器将返回 text ，因为 date 类型回退为 text 类型。如果不支持 <input type="date"> ，我们将隐藏本机选择器，并显示后备选择器UI（ <select> ）。

trans-unit.source: The other part of the code that may be of interest is the feature detection code — to detect whether the browser supports <input type="date">.

The other part of the code that may be of interest is the feature detection code — to detect whether the browser supports <input type="datetime-local">, we create a new <input> element, set its type to datetime-local, then immediately check what its type is set to. Browsers that don't support datetime-local return text, since that's what datetime-local falls back to. If <input type="datetime-local"> is not supported, we hide the native picker and show the fallback picker UI (<select>) instead.
trans-unit.target: 该代码的另一部分可能是有趣的功能检测代码—为了检测浏览器是否支持 <input type="datetime-local"> ，我们创建了一个新的 <input> 元素，并将其 type 设置为 datetime-local ，然后立即检查其类型设置为。不支持 datetime-local 的浏览器会返回 text ，因为那是 datetime-local 的后代。如果不支持 <input type="datetime-local"> ，我们将隐藏本机选择器，并显示后备选择器UI（ <select> ）。
